item.title: Cascadia Reception FAQ
item.description: What? A reception to celebrate the marriage of Emma Kelsey and Aidan Meacham Married on June 19, 2021 Where? The Cove - Normandy Park Community Club 1500 SW Shorebrook Dr, Normandy Park, WA 98166 When? 12 Noon - 5 PM, September 4, 2021 Light lunch at 1 PM, cake and toasts at 2 PM What should I wear? Attire is dressy casual - sundresses, button down shirts, and khaki pants The event will be primarily outside, so please plan accordingly
